text: Life in Your Hands () is a 1958 Soviet drama movie directed by Nikolai Rozantsev.В ТВОИХ РУКАХ ЖИЗНЬУмер Леонид Агранович It stars Oleg Strizhenov, Iosif Kutyansky, and Viktor Chekmaryov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1958 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Life in Your Hands
